primary_structure_shape_mature: elongated body with laterally compressed tail
primary_structure_color: wild: dark brown with speckling; leucistic: pink-white with red gills
key_differentiating_features: External feathery gills retained throughout life
Wide flat head with wide mouth
Four toes on front legs, five on back
Fin extending from head along back to tail
confusion_species_list: Ambystoma tigrinum larva (Tiger Salamander - usually metamorphoses)
sexual_dimorphism_notes: Males have swollen cloacal region; females plumper when gravid
